snippet: Researchers have found that the human brain is attracted to things that were once pleasing, but no longer are.
abstract: Study in journal Current Biology finds human brain is attracted to items that once provided award, even after they cease doing so.
lead_paragraph: Researchers have found that the human brain is attracted to things that were once pleasing, but no longer are.

headline.print_headline: Neurology: Proof the Brain Focuses on the Good Stuff
headline.main: Our Brains Remember the Good Stuff
